Package com.dougnoel.sentinel.databases

Class DatabaseFactory

java.lang.Object
com.dougnoel.sentinel.databases.DatabaseFactory
public class DatabaseFactory
extends Object
The DB Factory is a factory method that simply takes a string containing the name of a Database Object and returns the object to be worked on.

  • Method Details

    • buildOrRetrieveDatabaseConnection

      public static Database buildOrRetrieveDatabaseConnection​(String databaseConnectionName)
      Returns the Database Object for the database name. This allows us to operate on datbases without knowing they exist when we write step definitions.
      Parameters:
      databaseConnectionName - String the name of the database object
      Returns:
      Database the database object
